title: ProxyEmy
description: Local reverse proxy server fit as tool for development. Supporting HTTP/1.1, WS and secure connections. The configuration is stored in a YAML file.

title: drComRead
description: Application for reading digital comics. Supporting reading from CBZ(RAR), CBR(ZIP) and local folders. Organizing library and reading list included.

title: ArdorQuery
description: Tool for testing HTTP(s) endpoints from Websites, PWA, RESTful APIs and Web sockets.
